imdb.title: Wizard Barristers: Benmashi Cecil
imdb.plot: The story takes place in Tokyo in 2018, where normal humans and those who can use magic coexist. As a result, there are laws against using magic, and a "magic courtroom" exists to preside over lawsuits regarding magic use. In thes...

episodes.title: Lady Justice: Sword and Scales
episodes.plot: Rookie "wizard barrister" Cecil Sudo tackles her first case straight away, defending a wizard accused of using magic to kill a bank robber.

episodes.title: Hard Case
episodes.plot: Cecil looks for evidence to prove the self-defense of the Kohinata desperately. Then, she thought of a suprising idea.

episodes.title: Love and Hate
episodes.plot: The woman suspect of inflicting bodily injury resulting in death case asks Hachiya for her defense. Hachiya's fate is closely linked with that of her.

episodes.title: Personality Crisis
episodes.plot: Cecil pleads for the suspect of the serial murder case. The suspect and his brother take some strange behavior against Cecil.

episodes.title: Six Nine
episodes.plot: Kujira was arrested on suspicion of murder. Cecil takes on his case with Kamakiri.

episodes.title: Hero Show
episodes.plot: Cecil gets involved in a barricading case.

episodes.title: Maple Leaf in Canada
episodes.plot: The training in Boston was completed. Cecil who got a vacation goes to the Canadian home to meet her father with Hotaru.

episodes.title: Saint Christopher Charm
episodes.plot: Hotaru who knew the circumstances proffer help to Cecil.

episodes.title: Secret Puzzle
episodes.plot: Cecil reopens the investigation of her mother's case, but the parties concerned are uncooperative.

episodes.title: Imposters
episodes.plot: Cecil learns from Sameoka and Kujira that the truth about herself.

episodes.title: Shining Cecil
episodes.plot: Cecil is caught by the persons who want to use her magic power.

episodes.title: Fact or Fiction
episodes.plot: The ringleader who attacked Cecil appoint defense counsel to her.
